name: Sachiel
description: Sachiel is the Third Angel and the first to appear in the series. It attacks Tokyo-3 in the first episode but is defeated by Shinji Ikari piloting Evangelion Unit-01.

name: Shamshel
description: Shamshel is the Fourth Angel. It attacks Tokyo-3 in episode 4, where it is fought and defeated by Unit-01 piloted by Shinji Ikari.

name: Ramiel
description: Ramiel is the Fifth Angel. It appears in episode 6 and is known for its powerful particle beam attack. It poses a significant threat to Tokyo-3 and requires a complex strategy to defeat.

name: Gaghiel
description: Gaghiel is the Sixth Angel and the first to attack Tokyo-3 underwater. It appears in episode 8, where it battles Evangelion Unit-02 piloted by Asuka Langley Soryu.

name: Israfel
description: Israfel is the Seventh Angel. It appears in episode 9 and possesses the ability to split into two separate entities. It engages in a complex battle with Evangelion Units 01 and 02.
